cells.title: Product Design
cells.sub_text: I've been leading product teams across the globe professionally for over a 5 years – establishing design systems, building user interfaces, creating Xcode prototypes, animations and much more.

cells.title: iOS Development
cells.sub_text: I've been leading product teams across the globe professionally for over a 5 years – establishing design systems, building user interfaces, creating Xcode prototypes, animations and much more.

cells.title: Brand Identity
cells.sub_text: I help establish the artistic tone of a product, tying it together with a brand identity, based on simple geometric shapes, that are tailored for adaptation to meet the needs of modern businesses.

cells.title: Web Development
cells.sub_text: I create 3D models and animations for a range of projects — from detailed renders used in promotional material, to rigged character models ready to use in games.

cells.title: Music Mixing
cells.sub_text: I create edits of music, and various remixes, and post them on soundcloud, for general consumption.

cells.title: Photographer
cells.sub_text: I create shoot a wide variety of content, including weddings, nature,landscapes, and portaits. I have a natural view of detail.
